name: Monster Museum
description:
Have you ever dreamed of having your own museum where you can collect monsters?
Dream no further, because now you can do it in Monster Museum!
In this world, you can summon and collect monsters inspired by mythologies around the world and display them at your very own museum.

Features:
- Manage your own museum
- More than 50 monsters to collect and discover
- Buy decorations and make your museum the best to fit your style
- Tons of minigames! Such as fishing, planting, treasure hunting and many more
- Combine monsters to increase its tier and power
- Explore the city and find all the secrets!
- Follow the exciting story about the city

And most importantly, make your monster museum the best in the world!
